tea.name: CTC Black Tea
tea.description: This is a variant of Mount Dempo Black Tea, with a special granular form of tea leaves which has been processed directly from selected tea leaves, so that to serve it there is no need to filter it again, because the tea will dissolve and will settle by itself without leaving dregs on the surface. water, just pour it and brew it with hot water, it will produce a blacker color and a fragrant aroma that has a high quality taste and is rich in benefits for maintaining body health.
benefits: Reduces the risk of high blood pressure.
Also very good for consumption by active smokers, because it helps neutralize free radicals.
